wikipedia_page.main: Paul Macari (born 23 August 1976) is a Scottish former professional footballer. The son of former Scotland international Lou Macari, he played professionally for Stoke City and Huddersfield Town. His brother Mike Macari was also a professional footballer.

link_mentions.page: List of Huddersfield Town A.F.C. players
